A basic wrapper component for most layout related needs.

## Examples

### Default

<iframe style="width: 100%; border: 0px; height: 20px;" srcdoc="<html><head><link href='https://unpkg.com/@primer/css/dist/primer.css' rel='stylesheet'><script src='/static/index.js'></script></head><body><div>Your content here</div></body></html>"></iframe>

```erb
<%= render(Primer::BoxComponent.new) { "Your content here" } %>
```

### Color and padding

<iframe style="width: 100%; border: 0px; height: 54px;" srcdoc="<html><head><link href='https://unpkg.com/@primer/css/dist/primer.css' rel='stylesheet'><script src='/static/index.js'></script></head><body><div class='bg-gray p-3'>Hello world</div></body></html>"></iframe>

```erb
<%= render(Primer::BoxComponent.new(bg: :gray, p: 3)) { "Hello world" } %>
```
